definitions.definition: a system of money in general use in a particular country.
examples: the dollar was a strong currency

definitions.definition: the fact or quality of being generally accepted or in use.
examples: the term gained currency during the second half of the 20th century
synonyms: popularity "a term that has gained new currency"

definitions.definition: the time during which something is in use or operation.
examples: no claim had been made during the currency of the policy
